origin: 立ち上る黒煙に、急遽村まで戻る[플레이어]一行。その道中を一行は帝国兵達に阻まれるも、あくまで黒騎士にのみ従うスツルムとドランクは、容赦なく兵達を切り伏せていく。

name: 제국병
origin:
そこの者、止まれ！
剣を足元に置いて両手を……

name: 제국병
origin: ぐほっ！？

name: 슈투름
origin:
隙だらけ……
なってないな。
相変わらず帝国の軍人は笑わせてくれる。

name: 드랑크
origin:
とかなんとか言ってぇ～
スツルム殿、
全っ然表情変わってな……

name: 드랑크
origin: あ痛っ！？

name: 이오
origin:
でも、あたし達が島に来た時は、
軍艦なんてなかったわよね？
いつの間にこの島に……

name: 라캄
origin:
来たんだろうぜ……ついさっき、な。
目的はまだわからねぇが……

name: 오이겐
origin:
しかし、お前ら……いいのか？
帝国の傭兵が、
こんなことしちまってよ。

name: 슈투름
origin:
帝国じゃない……
あたし達の雇い主は黒騎士だ。

name: 슈투름
origin:
いま……
エルステ帝国が黒騎士を追放したのなら、
エルステ帝国はあたし達の敵だ。

name: 슈투름
origin:
無駄話……してる場合じゃない。
お前の故郷が焼け野原になっても、
あたしは責任を持たないぞ。
村では、エルステ帝国少将フュリアス率いる帝国兵達が跋扈していた。フュリアスの蛮行に声を荒げる[플레이어]一行。対しフュリアスは自らを魔晶で変身させ、配下の兵士諸共、[플레이어]達に攻撃を仕掛けてくる。

森を抜け、
[플레이어]が生まれ育った村に
駆けつける[플레이어]一行。

しかし、そこに村のかつての面影は無く、
のどかだった村には、
物々しい兵士達がひしめいていた。

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
ほらほら、さっさと並ばせてよ！
的は綺麗に並んでないと、
意味ないだろ？

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
っていうか数少なくない？
しょうがないな……
おい、そこのお前、お前も的に……

name: 帝国兵１
origin:
お、お待ちください！
フュリアス将軍閣下！

name: 帝国兵１
origin:
現在も捜索は続行しているのですが、
森に逃げ込んだ連中の捕獲が
難航しており……

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
森に……？
じゃあ、いいよ、そいつらは。
そのまま森ごと焼いちゃって。

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
森に火をつけろって言ってんの！
煙に巻かれれば、
そのうち出て来るだろ！？

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
ああもう！
なんかもう、お前、もういいや！

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
いますぐこいつ縛り上げて
誰か森に捨ててきてよ！

name: 帝国兵２
origin: はっ……畏まりました。

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
森に捨ててきたら、
そのまま森に火をつけて……

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
ああ、そうだ！
せっかくだし、
少しだけ燃やさずに残しておこうか！

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
火から逃げてきた連中は、
そこに集まるだろうから、
そこでまとめて狙い撃ちに……

name: 드랑크
origin:
いやー、
将軍サマは、ホント変わんないねー

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
お前……！
誰だっけ？ まぁ、いいや！

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
見てきなよ！ せっかくだからさぁ！

name: 라캄
origin:
ちっ……

name: 라캄
origin:

いまここで清算してやるよ！！

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
ああ？
誰だよ？ お前も……
ああ、くそ……うるさいなぁ！！

name: 카타리나
origin:
ロキが最後に言っていたことは、
恐らくこのことか……

name: 카타리나
origin:
しかし……
何故、完全に伝えないまでも、
奴は私達に忠告を残していったんだ？

name: 오이겐
origin:
考えるだけ無駄だろうぜ……
ああいう手合いは、
ただ人が混乱するのを見て楽しむんだ。

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
黙れよお前ら！！
お前も！ お前も！
あああああっ！ くそっ！ くそっ！！

name: 帝国兵２
origin:
しょ、将軍閣下！

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
くっ……はぁ、はぁ……
う、うるさいんだよ……
ずっと……ずっと……

name: 이오
origin:

origin:
前から変な奴だったけど、

name: 퓨리어스

お前も！ お前も！

ああ、いい眺めだ！ 最高だよ！

origin: がはっ！？

origin:
お、おい……！
あいついま、

誰が！？ 誰が！？ ねぇ！！

いままでのとは全然違う……

話が通じなさそうだ……

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
あはぁ……
なぁんだ……
君達、そんなところにいたんだ？

origin:
でも、君達誰だっけ？
ああ、いや、いいや、どうでも……

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
すぐに！ この力で！
君達が誰かなんて、
わからなくしてあげるよ！！
魔晶を使い暴走を続けるフュリアス。一行はフュリアスに決定的な一撃を与えるものの、フュリアスは魔晶の力で瞬く間に回復してしまう。厄介な魔晶に攻略法が見つからず絶望感に襲われる中、ビィの中には小さな決意が芽生えつつあった。

魔晶を使い、暴走するフュリアス。
一行は激戦の末フュリアスに、
決定的な一撃を与えるが……

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
は、はは……
すごい、すごいや！
全然痛くない……もう何も感じない！

origin:
これが魔晶の力……

origin:
ああ、最高の気分だ！
皇帝陛下には感謝しなくちゃ……

origin:
実験段階とはいえ、
こんなに素晴らしいものを
下さるなんてね……

origin:
フュリアス将軍閣下！

name: 帝国兵１
origin: があっ！？

origin:
ふ、ふふ……
はーはっはっはぁ！！

origin:

ほら、ほらほらほら！ ほらぁ！！

origin:

name: 帝国兵２

逃がさないよ……

name: 드랑크

name: 드랑크
origin:
あんなに強力なのは、
僕も初めて見たけど……

name: 오이겐
origin:
魔晶の力ってこたぁ……
つまり、その魔晶をどうにかすりゃ、
あいつを止められるのか？

name: リーシャ
origin:
裏を返せば、
魔晶をどうにかしないことには、
止められないということですね……

name: 드랑크
origin:
いや？
あれだったら、すぐに器のほうが
ダメになっちゃうだろうけど……

name: 카타리나
origin:
なに？
じゃあ、ある程度耐えしのげば……

name: 드랑크
origin:
でも、
その頃にはこの島ごと
空の底だろうねぇ……

name: 카타리나
origin: やはり正面から向き合う他ないか……

暴走するフュリアスを前に、
成す術を失う[플레이어]一行。

しかし、育ててくれた村を救うため、
ビィの中には一つの小さな決意が
芽生えつつあるのだった。
暴走するフュリアスに帝国兵すら撤退を始める。一行は縛られたままの村人達を助けるため、スツルムとドランクに村人の救出を頼み、自分達は時間稼ぎをすべくフュリアスと相対する。

name: 帝国兵１
origin:
総員退避！
フュリアス将軍閣下から離れるんだ！
いまの閣下は危険過ぎる！

name: 帝国兵２
origin: む、村の住人達はどうしますか！？

name: 帝国兵１
origin:
いまさら構ってられるか！
そんなもの放って……がはっ！？

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
逃げるっていうの？
このボクから？

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
くひっ、ひひひ……
ダメに決まってんだろ……
逃がさないって言ったんだからさぁ！！

name: 帝国兵２
origin: うわああぁぁぁっ！？

囚われた村人達をそのままに、
エルステ帝国の兵達は
命からがら散り散りに逃げて行く。

name: 이오
origin:
ちょ、ちょっと！
村の人達の縄くらい解いてきなさいよ！

name: 카타리나
origin:
マズイな……
このままでは、
奴の格好の標的となってしまう……

name: 라캄
origin:
おい、ドランク！
お前らで村の奴らを
どこかへ逃がしてやってくれ！

name: 라캄
origin:
その間、
俺達があのチビ将軍を引きつけて
時間を稼ぐ！

name: 드랑크
origin:
えー？
人使いが荒いんだから……

name: 슈투름
origin:
一宿一飯の恩……
昨日、村に泊めてもらった礼だ。
やるぞ、ドランク。

name: 드랑크
origin:
あ！ 待って待って！
スツルム殿！ 置いてかないでよね！

name: 카타리나
origin:
あの二人が、
私達の言うことに
大人しく従うとはな……

name: 이오
origin:
胡散臭い人達だけど……
きっと根は悪い奴じゃないのよね。

name: 오이겐
origin:
さて……と。
となりゃあ、
オレ達もオレ達の仕事をしねぇとな。

言い終えると共に
オイゲンが放った一撃は、
精確にフュリアスのこめかみをかすめる。

name: 퓨리어스
origin: あぁ……？

name: 오이겐

さぁ……
悪ぃがもっぺん遊んでもらうぜ！
将軍サンよぉ！！
村人達を避難させ、再びフュリアスと相対する一行。そんな折、ビィは自らに「マリス」を止める力があるのなら、その力で魔晶も止めることが出来るかもしれない、と提案する。しかし、それにはビィ自身が恐れる記憶の解放が伴うが、ビィはロゼッタを信じ、自らの故郷のために立ち上がる決意を固める。

フュリアスとの戦いの最中、
器用に攻撃の嵐を掻い潜りながら、
ドランクが大手を振って駆けてくる。

name: 드랑크
origin:
おーい！
こっち、頼まれてたの終わったよ～ん！

name: 슈투름
origin:
村の奴らは外縁の山に避難させた。
もうこの辺りには残ってない。

name: 카타리나
origin:
そうか……
しかし、やはり島から
避難させることは出来ないか……

name: 슈투름
origin:
無理……
あれだけの人数を賄える艇が無い。

name: リーシャ
origin:
となれば……
やはりあの将軍を、
何とかしなければなりませんね……

name: 라캄
origin:
ちっ……！
魔晶さえなきゃあ、
あんな奴、なんてことはねぇんだが……

name: 비
origin:
な、なぁ……
それなんだけどよ……

沈黙を貫いていたビィは、
おずおずとその手を挙げる。

origin:
オ、オイラ……
やっぱりあの封印を、

name: 카타리나

なっ……！？

魔晶の力なんだろ？

もしロゼッタが言ってたように、

魔晶を止められる力がある

origin:

name: 카타리나
origin:
封印を解いて記憶を取り戻すことで、
ビィ君が
ビィ君でなくなってしまうなら……

name: 비
origin:
へへっ……それなんだけどよ。

origin:

そんなことをしてくれ、って言わねぇ。

name: 비
origin:
ロゼッタも姐さんと同じ気持ちなら
あんなこと
言わなかったに決まってらぁ！

name: 비
origin:
だからきっと大丈夫だって……
オイラはロゼッタを信じる。

name: 비
origin:
それにここは、
オイラと[플레이어]の
故郷なんだぜ！

name: 비
origin:
故郷の危機に立ち上がらねーんじゃ、
騎空士の名が泣くってもんだぜ！

name: 카타리나
origin: ビィ君……

name: 드랑크
origin:

トカゲちゃんのくせに

name: 비
origin:
ん？

origin:

うしっ！
んじゃ、チビ将軍を引きつけながら、
あの祠まで戻るぞ！
森を駆け、再び祠の前へと集結する[플레이어]一行。ついにビィは祠を開け、力の封印を解く。刹那の間、ビィは幻を見るが大きな変化は訪れなかった。しかし、ビィは自らに宿った力の存在を確信し、一行は魔晶による暴走を続けるフュリアスに決戦を挑む。

[플레이어]一行は、
改めて祠の前に集結する。

異質な力を前にビィは息を呑むが、
その後ろからは着実に、
破壊の足音が近づいていた。

name: 오이겐
origin:
森に入ってだいぶ距離は稼げたが……
あの将軍サンはまだまだ
ご機嫌ナナメみてぇだなぁ、おい……

器の限界も、
まだしばらく先みたいだね～
将軍サマは見た目以上に頑丈みたいだ。

祠の扉に小さな手をかける。

origin:

name: 비

ああ！

name: 비
origin:
いまのオイラは、
いままでのオイラじゃねぇ……

name: 비
origin:
でも、オイラはオイラだ！

name: 비
origin:
だから……守り通してやろうぜ！
この島を……
オイラ達の故郷を！！
ついに魔晶を超え、フュリアスを止めることに成功する[플레이어]一行。フュリアスは魔晶の影響により、心身に深刻なダメージを受けていた。そこへ再びロキがフェンリルを連れて現れ、満身創痍のフュリアスを回収していく。さらなる敵の影はあるものの、一行はひとまずザンクティンゼルが救われたことに、安堵の息をつくのだった。

三度フュリアスと相まみえた一行は、
ついにその魔晶を超え、
フュリアスに一撃を与える。

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
ぐが……がはっ！？
ば、馬鹿な……
ふざけんな……！！

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
な、なんで……！？
くそっ！
ま、魔晶が反応しないだと……！？

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
げほっ、ごほっ……ぜぇ、ぜぇ……
嘘だ……こんなの嘘だ……

name: 퓨리어스
origin:
なんで誰も居ないんだよ！？
誰でもいいから、
早くボクを助けろぉぉぉっ！！

name: リーシャ
origin:
これが……
魔晶を使った者の末路だというの……？

name: ロキ
origin:
そうだね。
でもまぁ、彼は元々問題があったかな？

name: フェンリル
origin: ぐるるるる……

name: 이오
origin:
あ、あんた達！？
いつの間に……！？

name: 퓨리어스
origin: こ、皇帝陛下……

name: ロキ
origin:
今回は良いものを見せてもらったよ！
この臨場感は、
さすがにお芝居じゃ味わえないよね！

name: ロキ
origin:
やっぱり君達を
おもちゃに選んで正解だったな！
次も楽しみにしてるよ。

name: 라캄
origin:
おい、てめぇ……
次ってのはいったいどういうことだ？

name: ロキ
origin:
教えない……
だって未来を知っているのは、
神様だけで十分だろう？

name: ロキ
origin:
ただ、
そこに倒れてるのは回収させてもらうよ。
まだやりたいことがあるんだ。

name: ロキ
origin:
じゃ、またの機会に……
行くよ、フェンリル。

そう言うと光に包まれ、
ロキはフェンリル、フュリアスと共に
眩い光の中に姿を消した。

name: 오이겐
origin:
……はぁ。
ひとまず、これで島は助かったのか？

name: 드랑크
origin:
だねぇ～！
お疲れ様、トカゲちゃん！

name: 비
origin:
ああもう……
だからオイラは
トカゲじゃねーっつの！！

幾多の困難に見舞われながら、
なんとか故郷を救った
[플레이어]一行。

大きな一歩となって、
一行の旅を推し進めるのだった。

[플레이어] hurriedly leads the others back toward the village. Imperial soldiers stand in the way, but Sturm and Drang cut them down without hesitation—explaining that their loyalty is to the Black Knight, not the empire.

name: Imperial Soldier
origin: You there! Halt! Place your weapons at your feet and your hands above—

name: Imperial Soldier
origin: Gwah!

name: Sturm
origin: More openings in their defense than a broken sieve. Do they even bother training these imperial fools?

name: Drang
origin: You could at least smile when you crack a joke, Sturm.

name: Drang
origin: Oww!

name: Io
origin: There weren't any imperials on the island when we arrived. When did they get here?

name: Rackam
origin: They must have just arrived, although I've no idea why they're here.

name: Eugen
origin: Are you two okay with this? Aren't you imperial agents?

name: Sturm
origin: Not imperial agents, no. We were hired by the Black Knight.

name: Sturm
origin: If the Erste Empire has cast out the Black Knight, then the Erste Empire is our enemy.

name: Sturm
origin: Enough talk. Or do you want to keep jabbering while the village burns to the ground?

The village is crawling with Erste Empire troops, led by Major General Furias. When the crew confronts Furias, he uses dark essence to transform himself, and then attacks not only [플레이어] and company, but also his own men.
[플레이어] leads the crew out of the forest and back to the village.
However, the village is completely transformed and is now crawling with imperial troops.

name: Furias
origin: Quickly, line them up! I want the targets lined up in a perfect row!

name: Furias
origin: Hmm, there don't seem to be very many of them. You there! Line up with the others!

name: Imperial Soldier 1
origin: O-one moment! General Furias!

name: Imperial Soldier 1
origin: The search is ongoing, but we're having trouble capturing the ones who fled into the forest.

name: Furias
origin: Into the forest? Should be easy enough to handle them. We'll just burn the forest down with them in it!

name: Imperial Soldier 1
origin: But, General!

name: Furias
origin: I'm telling you to set fire to the forest! The smoke will drive them out!

name: Furias
origin: Enough explaining myself! I've had enough of you!

name: Furias
origin: Someone tie this imbecile up and throw him into the forest too!

name: Imperial Soldier 2
origin: Yes, General.

name: Furias
origin: Once you've done that, set fire to the trees.

name: Furias
origin: Ah, I have an even better idea! Make sure to leave some of the forest intact!

name: Furias
origin: The ones running from the fire will all gather there, giving us the perfect chance to take them down all at once.

name: Drang
origin: General, your methods haven't changed.

name: Furias
origin: You! Who are you again? Ah, no matter.

name: Furias
origin: Take a look! This is a great opportunity! I'm just about to test my new power on this island! On this village!

name: Rackam
origin: Tch... Not if we have something to say about it!

name: Rackam
origin: Hey, General Stumpy! I haven't forgotten what happened in Port Breeze!

name: Rackam
origin: I think it's time for a little payback!

name: Furias
origin: What? I don't know who you are either. Oh, enough of this! You're confusing me!

name: Katalina
origin: Loki said something about this, didn't he.

name: Katalina
origin: Kind of strange that he would give us a warning, don't you think?

name: Eugen
origin: No use thinking about it. That one just enjoys throwing everyone into disarray.

name: Furias
origin: Shut up, all of you! You! And you! Just stop talking! Aaaagh!

name: Imperial Soldier 2
origin: General! Calm yourself!

name: Furias
origin: Gah... Huff... Huff... All this noise... It never stops!

name: Io
origin: Hey, what's up with this guy?

name: Io
origin: He was a bit of a creep before, but now he's lost it completely.

name: Furias
origin: I'm going to shut you all up! I don't need anyone anymore!

name: Furias
origin: You! And you! I'm going to crush you! With my bare hands!

name: Furias
origin: Mwahahaha! Behold! Magnificent view, wouldn't you agree?

name: Imperial Soldier 2
origin: G-General. If you get too excited, the effect of the dark essence will...

name: Imperial Soldier 2
origin: Aaargh!

name: Rackam
origin: Hey! Wasn't that one of his own men?

name: Furias
origin: Who told you to talk back to me! Huh! Who! Who!

name: Lyria
origin: That power... It must be from dark essence, but it's completely different from anything I've seen before.

name: Vyrn
origin: This looks bad. I don't think we can talk the guy down.

name: Furias
origin: Ah. Now where did you come from?

name: Furias
origin: Who were you again? Ah, no, it doesn't matter...

name: Furias
origin: Now to put an end to you with this power!

The crew manages to land what should have been a finishing blow on Furias, but he uses the power of dark essence to instantly recover. As the party despairs in the face of this terrible power, Vyrn finds a new resolve growing inside him.
Fueled by dark essence, Furias embarks on a rampage. At the end of the raging battle, the party strikes a seemingly decisive blow.

name: Furias
origin: Ah, yes! Amazing! This is amazing! It doesn't hurt at all! I don't feel a thing!

name: Furias
origin: This is the true power of dark essence.

name: Furias
origin: I've never felt better! I owe the emperor my thanks.

name: Furias
origin: Still experimental to be sure, but I'm amazed he gave me something of such magnificence!

name: Imperial Soldier 1
origin: General Furias! The side effects of the dark essence are reaching a dangerous level! You should cease using it!

name: Imperial Soldier 1
origin: Aargh!

name: Furias
origin: Hahaha! Hahahahaha!

name: Furias
origin: What did you say? Dangerous? Say that again! Come on, speak!

name: Imperial Soldier 2
origin: F-fall back! Everyone, back! Get away from the general...

name: Imperial Soldier 2
origin: Aaaargh!

name: Furias
origin: No one is getting away. No-no-no-no one!

name: Rackam
origin: I can't believe it. Is this guy invincible?

name: Drang
origin: Nuh-uh... This is the power of dark essence.

name: Drang
origin: Although I've never seen it quite so strong.

name: Eugen
origin: If the power is coming from the dark essence, then we can stop him by destroying it, right?

name: Lecia
origin: More like that's our only option now.

name: Drang
origin: See that thing there holding the crystal? It looks like it won't last much longer under these conditions.

name: Katalina
origin: What? So we just need to hold out a little longer?

name: Drang
origin: Any longer will be enough time for him to knock this entire island from the sky!

name: Katalina
origin: Then we have to fight him head on!
[플레이어] and the crew, faced with the rampaging Furias, are seemingly out of options.
However, in the face of this threat to his home, a new determination begins to grow inside Vyrn.
Even the imperial soldiers start to retreat from Furias's rampage. The party ask Sturm and Drang to free the villagers, while they fight Furias themselves in order to buy some time.

name: Imperial Soldier 1
origin: Fall back! Get away from General Furias! He's too dangerous!

name: Imperial Soldier 2
origin: What about the villagers?

name: Imperial Soldier 1
origin: Forget them! We don't have time to free them now! Just run... Arrgh!

name: Furias
origin: Run, you say? From me?

name: Furias
origin: Hahaha! Impossible! I told you: no one is getting away!

name: Imperial Soldier 2
origin: Uurgh!
Leaving the captured villagers behind, the troops of the Erste Empire run for their lives, many falling as they go.

name: Io
origin: Hey! At least let the villagers go first!

name: Katalina
origin: This is bad. They'll be sitting ducks like this!

name: Rackam
origin: Hey, Drang! You two evacuate the villagers to safety!

name: Rackam
origin: We'll keep the little tyrant busy and buy you some time!

name: Drang
origin: Put us to work, why don't you!

name: Sturm
origin: These people gave us lodging and food last night. We owe them for that much at least. We need to help, Drang.

name: Drang
origin: Ah! Hold on, hold on! Sturm, don't leave me behind!

name: Katalina
origin: They seem to be doing what we ask for now.

name: Io
origin: They're a suspicious pair for sure, but I don't think they're bad people.

name: Eugen
origin: Well then, we need to do our part too.
As soon as he finishes speaking, Eugen unleashes an attack that skims Furias's forehead.

name: Furias
origin: You just don't give up!

Amid the battle with Furias, Drang skillfully dodges the endless barrage of attacks flying about and manages to perform the task requested of him and Sturm.

name: Drang
origin: Hey! We did what you asked!

name: Sturm
origin: We got the villagers out into the mountains. There's no one left nearby!

name: Katalina
origin: Good. But we can't get them off the island completely, can we?

name: Sturm
origin: No. We don't have an airship large enough for that.

name: Lecia
origin: In which case we have to do something about that general.

name: Rackam
origin: Dang! Without that dark essence, he'd be nothing!

name: Vyrn
origin: About that actually...
Vyrn had remained silent but now speaks up.

name: Vyrn
origin: I've decided to break the seal.

name: Katalina
origin: What? Why now?

name: Vyrn
origin: The little guy's power is from dark essence, the same as Yggdrasil Malice, right?

name: Vyrn
origin: If, like Rosetta said, I have the power to stop Malice...

name: Vyrn
origin: Then, does that mean I also have the power to stop dark essence?

name: Katalina
origin: You might be right. Rosetta explained that Malice comes from dark essence.

name: Katalina
origin: But, Vyrn, weren't you also worried about the other things Rosetta said?

name: Katalina
origin: If getting your memories back will change who you are, do you really want to do it?

name: Vyrn
origin: Heh, well, I've been thinking about that.

name: Vyrn
origin: Rosetta would never tell me so directly to break the seal.

name: Vyrn
origin: She'd never leave me without making sure I can make my own choice!

name: Vyrn
origin: So I'm sure it'll all be okay! I trust Rosetta!

name: Vyrn
origin: This is my home! Mine and [플레이어]'s!

name: Vyrn
origin: How can I call myself a skyfarer if I don't stand up to this threat to my home!

name: Katalina
origin: Vyrn...

name: Drang
origin: Hah! Pretty cool for a lizard.

name: Vyrn
origin: What did you just say?

name: Drang
origin: Oh, nothing at all! Now that you've made the decision, let's go!

name: Rackam
origin: Right! Let's keep General Stumpy busy while you guys hurry back to the shrine!

Vyrn opens the doors to the shrine and sees a brief vision, but undergoes no other major changes. However, now confident in the power that's always resided inside himself, Vyrn and the rest of the crew face down the rampaging Furias one more time.
[플레이어] and the crew gather at the shrine again.
Vyrn is still frightened by the power of the place, but sounds of destruction are closing in from behind.

name: Eugen
origin: We managed to give him the slip in the forest and buy us some time, but that general is still in a real bad mood.

name: Drang
origin: His dark essence is still holding out as well. The guy's tougher than he looks.
[플레이어] holds Vyrn in front of the shrine, who in turn reaches up to open the doors.

name: Lyria
origin: Vyrn...

name: Vyrn
origin: Don't worry about me! You'll make me all anxious again!

name: Vyrn
origin: Say, [플레이어]. Do you remember when we used to train in this forest?

name: Vyrn
origin: Back then I never thought things would come to this...
I was ready for it.
I'm still surprised by it now.

name: Vyrn
origin: Really? You've been expecting something like this the whole time? I don't believe that for a moment!

name: Vyrn
origin: Me too! But it was fun leaving this island, wasn't it?

name: Vyrn
origin: Traveling the skies and going to various islands with you is an experience that'll always stay with me, [플레이어].

name: Vyrn
origin: But coming back here has made me see how much I missed home.

name: Vyrn
origin: Everyone in the village has been so kind to me.

name: Vyrn
origin: So I'm going to do this and play my part!

name: Vyrn
origin: Huh?

name: Vyrn
origin: Yay! I'm still in one piece!

name: Lyria
origin: Vyrn?

name: Katalina
origin: Vyrn...

name: Vyrn
origin: I opened up the doors... and then...
The open doors of the shrine sway gently in the wind.

name: Io
origin: Wait, so are you okay? Nothing happened?

name: Vyrn
origin: I'm not sure. I do feel a little different.

name: Katalina
origin: Oh no! Vyrn, please tell me you're not—

name: Vyrn
origin: Relax! It's still me in here!

name: Vyrn
origin: But there's something inside me. A power that wasn't there before.

name: Orchis
origin: I can't feel the power that was emanating from the shrine anymore. Has it transferred into Vyrn?

name: Vyrn
origin: I can't tell...
In the middle of the conversation, Furias smashes through the trees as he enters the clearing.

name: Furias
origin: Found you! Hiding here, were you?

name: Furias
origin: Making me search for you! Hold on! Who was I looking for again?

name: Furias
origin: Ah, no matter! I'll just squish you all! For the fun of it!

name: Rackam
origin: This guy doesn't give up, does he! Can you fight, Vyrn?

name: Vyrn
origin: Sure thing! I've got this! At least, it feels like I do!

name: Vyrn
origin: I'm not the same Vyrn anymore!

name: Vyrn
origin: And yet I'm still me! That'll never change!

name: Vyrn
origin: I'm gonna defend this island! And my home!

[플레이어] and the crew finally manage to overcome the dark essence and stop Furias. Out of nowhere, Loki and Fenrir appear again and take the wounded Furias away. Although the shadow of future enemies still looms over them, for now the party celebrates having saved Zinkenstill.
Facing Furias for a third time, the party finally manages to surpass his dark essence and strikes a decisive blow.

name: Furias
origin: Argh! Aaaargh! I-impossible! This can't be happening!

name: Furias
origin: What? Curses! The dark essence isn't responding!

name: Furias
origin: Arrgh... This can't be happening... This isn't real!

name: Furias
origin: Where's everyone else? Someone! Anyone! Come save me!

name: Lecia
origin: So this is what happens to those who use dark essence.

name: Loki
origin: Looks like it. Although this guy had a few issues to start with.

name: Fenrir
origin: Grrrrr...

name: Io
origin: You two again! Where did you come from?

name: Furias
origin: Your Imperial Highness...

name: Loki
origin: How thrilling this all was! The raw tension! You can't fake it!

name: Loki
origin: I was right to choose you as my playthings! I look forward to your next performance.

name: Rackam
origin: Hold it! What do you mean, 'next'?

name: Loki
origin: I can't tell you that. Only the gods can see the future.

name: Loki
origin: I'm taking the remnants of this poor fool back with me though. I've still got something I want to do with him.

name: Loki
origin: We'll meet again soon. Let's go, Fenrir.
With that, Loki, Fenrir, and Furias are surrounded in a dazzling light and then vanish.

name: Eugen
origin: Phew. I think this means we saved the island. Right?

name: Drang
origin: Looks like it! Great work, you charming little lizard!

name: Vyrn
origin: Enough already! I ain't no lizard!
Overcoming multiple obstacles, [플레이어] and the others manage to save the island and thereby the village.
Vyrn's newly awakened powers are also set to propel the crew onto the next exciting step of their adventure.
